contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Province TR |name = Karabük |map=Karabük in Turkey.svg |region = Black Sea |licence = 78 |total population = 227,610 |tpop_as_of = 2010 |area_code= 370 |area= 4109 |website= http://www.karabuk.gov.tr |turkname = Karabük ili | income = 9,657 TL (59th; |}} '''Karabük Province''' ({{lang-tr|Karabük ili }}) is a landlocked [[Provinces of Turkey|province]] in the northern part of [[Anatolia]] (northern central [[Turkey]]), located about {{convert|200|km|0|abbr=on}} north of [[Ankara]], {{convert|115|km|0|abbr=on}} away from [[Zonguldak]] and {{convert|113|km|0|abbr=on}} away from [[Kastamonu]], with a total population of 227,610 (as of 2010). The main city is [[Karabük]] which is located about {{convert|100|km|0|abbr=on}} south of the [[Black Sea]] coast. Karabük Province is one of the newest provinces of Turkey. Until 1995 it was a district of [[Zonguldak Province|Zonguldak]], when it became an ''[[Provinces of Turkey|il]]'' (provincial center) in its own right. Established in 1995, it comprises Karabük, Eflani, Safranbolu and Yenice districts which were formerly part of [[Zonguldak Province]] and Eskipazar and Ovacık districts which were previously part of [[Çankırı Province]]. Karabük is located on the highway between [[Bartın Province|Bartın]] and [[Ankara]], which was in ancient times an important route between [[Amasra]] on the coast and central [[Anatolia]]. The railway between Ankara and [[Zonguldak]] passes through Karabük. [[Safranbolu]], a historically important city, which is listed in the [[UNESCO World Heritage]] List, is located in Karabük Province. == Districts == Karabük province is divided into 6 [[Districts of Turkey|districts]] (capital district in '''bold'''): * [[Eflani]] * [[Eskipazar]] * '''[[Karabük]]''' * [[Ovacık, Karabük|Ovacık]] * [[Safranbolu]] * [[Yenice, Karabük|Yenice]] ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:Safranbolu traditional houses.jpg|Traditional houses of Safranbolu Image:Safranbolu arasta.jpg|Historical shoe-maker shops in Safranbolu Image:Bostancı Pond.jpg|Bostancı Pond in Eflani Image:Eflani.jpg|Eflani countryside </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{Commons category}} * {{tr icon}} [http://www.karabuk.gov.tr/ Karabük governor's official website] * {{tr icon}} [http://www.karabuk.bel.tr/ Karabük municipality's official website] * {{en icon}} [http://www.dmi.gov.tr/en-US/forecast-cities.aspx?m=KARABUK Karabük weather forecast information] * [http://www.karabukrehberi.com Karabük Guide] * {{tr icon}} [http://www.eflanim.net/ Eflani News] {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Karabük|image=Karabuk|}} {{Provinces of Turkey}} {{coord|41|13|25|N|32|38|25|E|region:TR-78_type:adm1st|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Karabuk Province}} [[Category:States and territories established in 1995]] [[Category:Karabük Province]] {{Karabük-geo-stub}}
